ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Song weaving 101
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Fortunately, at lvl 12 this problem becomes trivial .  Bellow, once you learn how to use it, is a great song and you become one of the best pullers in
ygData.messageBody:
--- "Webber, Jessica" <webber@...> wrote:
> I was referring to chasing a mob before the fight
> begins. If I just try to
> hit the mob with my weapon I'll run into the problem
> where I think I'm
> chasing it but in reality I'm ahead of it. If I can
> safely sing CoD I just
> have to be near it when the song pulses.

Fortunately, at lvl 12 this problem becomes "trivial"
<g>. Bellow, once you learn how to use it, is a great
song and you become one of the best pullers in the
game. (now if they would only let us have tracking
earlier we would truly Rock!)
